com.caoccao.javet.interop.converters

Class JavetPrimitiveConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caoccao.javet.interop.converters.BaseJavetConverter
      • com.caoccao.javet.interop.converters.JavetPrimitiveConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJavetConverter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavetObjectConverter

    public class JavetPrimitiveConverter
extends BaseJavetConverter
    The type Javet primitive converter converts Java primitive types to JS primitive types bi-directionally.
    Since:
    0.7.1
